task.title: Sand The Platen Roller
task.shortdesc: After removing the platen roller from the typewriter, follow the steps below to sand the roller.

step.cmd: Wrap your sandpaper around the platen roller.
Turn the platen by hand to evenly sand the entire surface.
Gently work the sandpaper up and down the length of the platen roller to remove the hardened top layer of rubber.
Remove sand debris from the roller using a damp cloth.
Set the roller in front of a fan to quickly dry the surface.
